author: cha cha
text: I bought a pair of trousers that were falsely advertised as far as the measurements on Grailed. When i explained this to customer service their suggestion was to repost the pants and re-sell them on their site. Such helpful advice. It’s called customer service, not customer disservice! But they’re is nothing that keeps their service team accountable, there isn’t even a phone number you can call to speak to someone directly. Oh and the “person” who sold the pants his username is ericjscott. Buyer beware! He admitted to falsely advertising the pants 4 pant sizes bigger than they actually are, and what does Grailed do??? Literally nothing.
title: Grailed has the worst customer service.

author: Ano
text:
When everything goes according to the plan, it's a great platform to acquire cool pieces of clothing. However, when something goes wrong - don't expect much. The customer support can't handle anything and they'll just ignore you, if they can't find a solution beneficial to them.  Like seriously they'll just stop answering your emails, plain silence.

I lost a lot of money, but thankfully I lost it while making a purchase that was only several hundreds of dollars. Now I know that this service can't be trusted and I won't be using it anymore. Had I been buying some actual grail worth thousands and something had gone wrong, I would've lost all of my money.
title: When everything goes according to the…

author: W
text:
Grailed has horrible customer service. 
As a seller, I had 2 items flagged as inauthentic and when I attempted to appeal, they ignored me after I submitted evidence. Even now, I have an open service ticket which is actively being ignored. I sent a message on Twitter and it's still being ignored.

Edit : Replying to Grailed : I have already tried posting on reddit. My post was deleted. I sent a reddit PM. Never got a response.

Don't claim "you're trying to respond in 24 hours" when its been 2 weeks since the incident.
title: Grailed has horrible customer service

author: JackH
text: Other than a cool font/nice page Grailed is just a haven for scammers.  You can literally post anything and leave it up forever.  No rules or accountability.  I just bought an item and the seller ghosted.  I got a message from Grailed support saying they will email the scammer.  Uh...that’s it?   Then they close the scammer’s account and I have to deal with PayPal and pray I get my money back.  Never again.  Use eBay or The Real Reall, where there are  rules, guarantees and professional buyer support.  **Update** Grailed put this sugar sweet response on my review to try and save face.  I contacted them and their response was that it was PayPal's problem now.  Grailed DOES NOT have any buyer protection plan.  They are liars.  DO NOT be fooled by these crooks.
title: Crooked Liars

author: Javid F
text:
Buyer Protection is an absolute scam. Provides no benefit above and beyond standard PayPal protection, not sure how they can claim that this is Grailed protection at all?

Purchasesd a jacket which was identified as counterfeit by Grailed after I brought it to their attention. Sent the item back to the seller as per PayPal rules, however PayPal failed to provide a refund, and Grailed failed to provide any mediation, support, or service regarding the matter - simply referred to PayPal claims. After Grailed wiped their hands of the issue my following emails have been totally ignored. 

Better off paying retail. Over $400 out of pocket for absolutely nothing.
title: Buyer Protection is an absolute scam
